title: Labour Leader WILL Back Remain In A Referendum (with Anna McMorrin, MP)
itunes:title: Labour Leader WILL Back Remain In A Referendum (with Anna McMorrin, MP)
description:
Labour MP Anna McMorrin tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing a referendum rather than an election is the best way to sort out Brexit, and that Jeremy Corbyn would campaign for Remain if he's still party leader. Bloomberg's Ian Wishart joins from Brussels with the EU's latest thinking on an extension.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
